txt.en: <rgb=#ffa200>'Shátaz skámurz, íst gúrz tûg, agh ghâsh ukú..'</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>'Release more prisoners!'</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>'Show no mercy!'</rgb>
The Dungeons of Naerband
<rgb=#FF0000>'From the shadows of Udûn, he has tormented his prey!'</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>'Few Wargs match the power of Nuzdum!'</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>'A fierce warrior of the Morgai, comes for you.'</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>'Gar! You are such pests!'</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>'Enter Gristlebite, spawn of Shelob!'</rgb>
'Burn in the flames!'
<rgb=#FF0000>'I'll just have to finish you off myself!'</rgb>
'Sauron gave me the gift of fire.'
<rgb=#FF0000>'Guards, prepare to release the prisoners!'</rgb>
'Shaping the flame, I continue the work of the Dark Lord.'
<rgb=#FF0000>'Hear me, Naerband! I'll only say this once!'</rgb>
'Since I first laid eyes on you, you have been nothing but miserable and pathetic!'
<rgb=#FF0000>'Whoever kills these pests today shall walk free!'</rgb>
'A trifling nuisance, barely worth my attention.'
<rgb=#FF0000>'I have spoken!'</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>'Quickly, open all the cells!'</rgb>
'Somehow you persist!'
<rgb=#FF0000>'Destroy these pests and claim your prize!'</rgb>
'Now, it is time... Your torture session has begun!'
'There is nothing you can do!'
<rgb=#FF0000>'From within the walls of Seregost, abominations are born!'</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>'None are more cursed than those who face Bolvág!'</rgb>
'Hurry up and free the prisoners! We got company!'
'There, the cells are unlocked!'
'Look alive maggots! They aren't getting past us!'
<rgb=#FF0000>'This deadly beast needs no rider to strike fear!'</rgb>
'You better not let Thraknûl down, or I'll cut you myself!'
<rgb=#FF0000>'Where ever you walk in Gorgoroth, Rotwing will find you!'</rgb>
You must have completed 'Discovery: The Dungeons of Naerband' to play this instance.
'Death comes nearer!'
'All you will know is darkness!'
<rgb=#FF0000>'I welcome you, one and all, to Naerband!'</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>'Now prisoners, come and fight for your freedom!'</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>'My master, Thraknûl, has been expecting you.'</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>'Our cells are nearly full, but this room is for you!'</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>'This is Direhold, and it will be your doom!'</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>'For I, Gumog, will see to it!'</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>'Now it is time to meet your first cellmate!'</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>'This beast of fire, is a true terror of the skies!'</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>'Spitpyre will rain flames down upon you!'</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>'Do you really think you will win?! Your defeat is at hand!'</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>'For the very lake that gives Naerband its fires has born this beast!'</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>'Uiliúr has come to destroy you once and for all!'</rgb>
